references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of HOI detection, providing a benchmark dataset and baseline methods which many later works build upon.
This work introduces the task of referring relationships, pushing research towards more flexible models that can reason about visual relationships in response to textual prompts.

references.paper_title: Visual relationship detection with language priors
references.reason: This paper is highly influential as it introduced the Visual Relationship Detection dataset (VRD), a widely used benchmark for evaluating visual relationship understanding models.

references.paper_title: Neural motifs: Scene graph parsing with global context
references.reason: This paper proposed the Neural Motifs model, which significantly advanced the capabilities of scene graph generation models by incorporating global context into their predictions.

references.paper_title: Scene graph generation by iterative message passing
references.reason: This paper introduced the iterative message passing framework for scene graph generation, a significant development that has heavily influenced subsequent work in scene graph generation and visual relationship understanding.
